spatial_accuracy.notes: General layout is preserved, but there are scaling issues in the kitchen/utility area. Door placements are largely correct, but window openings are treated as open wall segments in several areas.

structural_fidelity.notes: The model fails the strict 'NO text labels' constraint significantly, as labels are baked into the floor texture. The maid's room has been reinterpreted as a balcony/open space.

furniture_mapping.notes: Excellent furniture mapping; bed styles and sofa arrangements closely follow the 2D reference with consistent scale.

aesthetic_quality.notes: The render uses textures (marble floors, wood grains) which violates the 'no textures/flat colors' rule. Lighting includes soft shadows, straying from the requested flat shading.

detected_errors.description: Heavy presence of text labels and measurement lines baked onto the floor plane.
Maid's room transformed into an open 'Balcony' area (hallucination/structural reinterpretation).
Presence of complex textures (marble, wood) and realistic shadows contrary to the low-poly flat-color requirement.
Proportional distortion in the kitchen island and utility wall alignment.
